alert.note: Alert for Chelan; Douglas (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued October 04 at 1:42PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: An Air Quality Alert has been issued by the Washington Department of Ecology in Yakima for Chelan and Douglas counties until further notice. The Washington Department of Ecology has announced an Air Quality Alert for Chelan and Douglas counties, due to risk of wildfire smoke. This Air Quality alert is in effect until further notice. Particulate matter (PM2.5) levels may very from unhealthy to hazardous close to wildfires in the area. Please visit WA Smoke Blog wasmoke.blogspot.com for real time AQ levels and updated smoke forecasts. Health Impacts and Recommended Actions: When air quality is Unhealthy, everyone should limit their time outdoors, and people with asthma, respiratory infections, diabetes, lung or heart disease should stay indoors.
